Text: Bloomington Edge:  They left the IFL for the Champions Professional Indoor Football League (CPIFL) in 2013, and in 2015 the CPIFL merged with the Lone Star Football League (LSFL) to create Champions Indoor Football (CIF), where Bloomington did not follow and joined X-League Indoor Football (X-League).

Text: Bloomington Edge:  Following the 2015 season the Edge joined the CIF.
Triplets:<Bloomington Edge

<Text: Bloomington Edge:  The Edge play their home games at the Grossinger Motors Arena.>
